title: Trump Blabs About Mike Pompeo's Secret Meeting with North Korea | Chelsea Clinton
itunes:title: Trump Blabs About Mike Pompeo's Secret Meeting with North Korea | Chelsea Clinton
description:
A "poop train" causes problems in Alabama, Trump tells reporters about a clandestine meeting with Kim Jong-un, and Chelsea Clinton discusses "She Persisted Around the World."
